title: Merge Duplicate User Accounts
description: A user accidentally signed up twice with two different email addresses and wants to merge their accounts.

tasks.description: Identify the two accounts the user wants to merge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates both user accounts in the system.

tasks.description: Explain the merge process, including which email address will become the primary and that data will be combined.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets clear expectations for the merge process.

tasks.description: Execute the account merge tool, selecting one account as the primary and the other to be merged and deactivated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully merges the two accounts into one.
